works.complaint:
Dear Google Legal Department:

We continue to be personally harassed by Tad Timothy, whom we notified you  
about on June 20 when we asked you to remove defamatory and libelous links  
and content he posted about us on Ripoff Report from Google Search Results  
(those links and content are included below again for your reference.) He  
continues to stalk us, our business and drive by our house.
Today we have found that the same person, Tad Timothy, re-posted the same  
defamatory and libelous content on a different website, Scaminformer.com.  
We are again writing to ask you to remove links with defamatory and  
libelous content that Tad Timothy posted about us on both sites, Ripoff  
Report and Scam Informer, from Google search results for the Keywords,  
“Shana Whitmarsh,” “Peter Whitmarsh”, “LucidStream”, “Lucid Stream,” “Peter  
Whitmarsh LucidStream”, “Shana Whitmarsh LucidStream” or “lucidstream.”   
The offending links and their defamatory content are included below.

These are the links with the defamatory content that Tad Timothy re-posted  
at “scaminformer.com”:
